title: The Many Faces Of Guns N' Roses (3-CD's) 2014 320ak
description:
The Many Faces Of Guns N' Roses (3-CD's) 2014 320ak

Well I looked around and no one had a decent dialog for this so I guess Ill do it myself.

Last year I touched on this with "The Roots and Seeds of Guns N' Roses". 
This takes it the rest of the way. 
With the addition of the 3rd CD that covers the music of the times. 

The fellas showed up at a perfect time: Hair Metal was winding down, Grunge was on the way up and Metallica was working there way to being the standard for thrash metal.
And the gunners were pushing the whole thing with their over the top playing,lifestyle,and publicity debacles. And Then some.  
Enjoy and share with others.
analogkid6103
